caption: Figure 1: The efficiency of the first-price auction with machine-learned reserves when the accuracy of the reserves is γ ∈ [0, 1].
description: This figure shows how the price of anarchy (PoA) in a first-price auction changes based on the accuracy of machine-learned reserves.  The x-axis represents the accuracy (γ) of the reserves, ranging from 0 (completely inaccurate) to 1 (perfectly accurate). The y-axis shows the PoA, which measures the efficiency of the auction. As the accuracy of the reserves increases, the PoA improves, approaching 1 (perfect efficiency).  The curve demonstrates a smooth transition between the case with no machine learning (γ = 0) and perfect accuracy (γ = 1).
